title: Welcome to Double Digits, Champ! ğŸ‰
content: Hey Nanu! You're 10 now! I'm writing this when you're 6 â€” you're currently obsessed with buses, trains, and trucks. You ask me about 500 questions a day, and honestly, I love every single one. I hope you never stop being curious. You're the best thing that ever happened to me. Love you, kiddo! â€” Dad â¤ï¸

title: You're a Teenager Now! ğŸ˜±
content: Dear Nanu, if you're reading this, you survived being a teenager (so far ğŸ˜„). When I wrote this, you were 6 and thought the funniest thing in the world was when I made silly faces. I hope I'm still making you laugh! Remember â€” no matter how tall you get, you'll always be my little guy. â€” Dad â¤ï¸

title: An Adult! (Technically ğŸ˜…)
content: Hey Nanu, 18! Wow. When I wrote this, you were running around the house pretending to drive a bus and making engine sounds. I wonder what you're driving now (hopefully safely!). I built this whole blog for you when you were little â€” every silly thing you said, every adventure we went on. I hope these memories make you smile. You've always been my greatest adventure. Love you forever â€” Dad â¤ï¸

title: The World is Yours, Nanu! ğŸŒ
content: Dear Nanu, you're 21. I started writing this blog when you were 6 years old. Back then, your biggest worry was whether we'd take the bus or the car. Now you've got the whole world ahead of you. Whatever you do, wherever you go â€” know that your Dad is incredibly proud of you. Always has been, always will be. I love you more than words on any blog could ever say. â€” Dad â¤ï¸
